doc.field: New Day Weekend With Victor Blackwell and Christi Paul

reporter: joe biden held it's official kickoff rally here in philadelphia a message of unity and emphasizing the need to defeat president trump in 2020. biden argued that the policies that are important to voters and to democrats and civil liberties and a woman's right to choose, bold climate change plan none of that will happen in president trump is still in office. biden really portrayed the president as a divisive figure.
